  • Constructor Details

    • QuartoFile

      public QuartoFile()
      Initializes a new QuartoFile instance. Constructs the QuartoHistory objects for the head and save pointers.

  • Method Details

    • canRedo

      public boolean canRedo()
      Checks if there are any redo operations available.
      Returns:
      true if redo is possible, false otherwise.

    • canUndo

      public boolean canUndo()
      Checks if there are any undo operations available.
      Returns:
      true if undo is possible, false otherwise.

    • saveFile

      public void saveFile​(String fileName, String firstPlayerName, String secondPlayerName, int[] playerType) throws IOException
      Saves the current game state to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to save.
      firstPlayerName - The name of the first player.
      secondPlayerName - The name of the second player.
      playerType - An array containing the type of each player.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to the file.

    • chargeFile

      public String[] chargeFile​(String fileName)
      Loads game state from a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to load.
      Returns:
      An array containing information about the players if successfully loaded, null otherwise.

    • getSave

      public QuartoHistory getSave()
      Gets the current save state of the game.
      Returns:
      The current save state.

    • getHead

      public QuartoHistory getHead()
      Gets the head of the game history.
      Returns:
      The head of the game history.

    • setSave

      public void setSave​(QuartoHistory s)
      Sets the save state of the game.
      Parameters:
      s - The new save state.
